Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Wakeforest Drive, between the Shrine of Creation on the east side of the road and the Holy Order of the Red Rose on the west side.
Room.LongDescription: The Holy Order of the Red Rose is one of the Paladin's training centers in Oceancrest. This center is designed to train intermediate level Paladins before they enter the services of Lyanden Castle. The Shrine of Creation is a monument to life in general, although no one can really figure out who built it or why. Many people, however, still frequent the small shrine, hoping for a miracle of some sort.
